title: Nonary Watch Face
summary: Fan-created Android Wear watch face for fans of 999, VLR and Zero Escape series.
description: A free Android Wear watch face for fans of the Zero Escape game series: 999 (Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors), Virtue's Last Reward, and Zero Time Dilemma. Take part in the Nonary Game yourself with this colorful watch face for your Android Wear watch! The death skull turns red whenever the hours and minutes add to "9"!Background art used is property of Aksys Games. No responsibility or ownership is claimed; this app is provided 100% free for fans.
descriptionHTML:
A free Android Wear watch face for fans of the Zero Escape game series: 999 (Nine Hours, Nine Persons, Nine Doors), Virtue's Last Reward, and Zero Time Dilemma.

Take part in the Nonary Game yourself with this colorful watch face for your Android Wear watch! The death skull turns red whenever the hours and minutes add to "9"!

Background art used is property of Aksys Games. No responsibility or ownership is claimed; this app is provided 100% free for fans.
comments: It's cool but... I love the Zero Escape franchise and a watch face based on it is awesome, but why does it have to be a 24 hour clock? And the it's hard to tell the time because the numbers are so small and blend in with the background a little. I like it a lot but I need a watch face that I can just glance at real quick and see what time it is.
Seems interesting I like the idea but can't find the app in either my apps list or widgets where is it stored.
Oh, Android Wear exclusive. Meh. Three stars for the idea.
Fine Could be  better, if you could set it
recentChanges: Digital typeface for seconds, minor updates.
